aggregate[source]

aggregate(df:DataFrame, spec:List[typing.List[str]], agg_fn:typing.Callable=sum)

Aggregates df according to spec using agg_fn.

Type Default Details
df DataFrame DataFrame with columns ['ds', 'y'] and columns to aggregate
spec typing.List[typing.List[str]] List of levels. Each element of the list contains a list of columns of df to aggregate.
agg_fn typing.Callable sum Function used to aggregate 'y'.
{% endraw %}
